title: U.S. consumer usage of mobile payments 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Made a mobile payment and lowest at Response Sent money internationally.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 62.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response Made a mobile payment has the highest Share of respondents and Sent money internationally has the lowest Share of respondents.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Made a mobile payment and lowest at Response Sent money internationally.
The Share of respondents of Response Sent money internationally is 32.0% smaller than the maximum value at Made a mobile payment.
Response Made a mobile payment is higher than any other Responses with value 64.0, followed by , and Purchase in-app or online. Down to Response Sent money internationally with the lowest value 2.0.
The Response Sent money internationally has 2.58 times less Share of respondents than average.
The Share of respondents is 248.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
